website_summaries.verdict: A simple and affordable product that will allow you to style your hair and massage it at the same time.
pros: Comes in a unique brush design with a long handle that is comfortable to grip in the shower
Provides a good, simple massage that is gentle on the skin and damaged hair
Good for thin and thick hair styles
cons: Bristles can be too flexible for a deep massage

customer_reviews.title: TRULY scrubs the scalp!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If, like me, you are looking for a scalp brush for a "vigorous" shampoo, search no further! I almost didn't buy this because the pictures and detail did not show how long the bristles are. They measure 5/8 inch long and I am attaching a picture from the side. This brush feels heavenly, while removing psoriasis scales and totally stimulating my scalp! So relaxing, like at the salon! If you want a good scrubbing like fingernails, get this product! If you prefer fingertips, keep your flimsy silicone scrubber! I should have known...duh...Fuller Brush products are always amazing. Spend the extra cash, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: MAR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scalp brush & 👍Handle👍 is a Game-changer
customer_reviews.text: Love this scalp brush. Psorasis in the hair really needs frequent shampooing & this brush gently does the scrubbing needed without slipping out of your hands like the other octagon styles can. It's HANDLE & Little bit larger scalp brush are the BEST of ALL !! Feels great, just firm enough but gentle enough! Using the small octagon shaped type all along and they were an excellent find but this is JUST GOOD OLD AWESOME, GREAT JOB SHAMPOOING AND A FLEXIBLE HANDLE. SO EASY TO USE...LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: JUST-ME

customer_reviews.title: Feels good on your scalp during a shower
customer_reviews.text: Love this massage brush - been using one for years. Use it regularly and you won't have a problem with dandruff. And besides, it feels good on the scalp during a shower.
customer_reviews.author: cbHoo

customer_reviews.title: Great brush except sharp angles
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a brush with a real handle and this seemed like the perfect solution. I have super thick hair and a lot of it. The bristles hold up just fine and do a great job massaging my scalp while I let the shampoo sit. The downside is that it has sharp angles on the sides of the handle and sharp corners on the bottom. Since my hands are usually slippery and the material is slick, I have to grip the handle a bit tighter and it hurts. I'm going to try filing the sharp parts and if that doesn't work then I will continue using it until I find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shields

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to try a scalp massage brush as my husband has a cheap one he loves but the bristles are not deep enough to get to my scalp. Saw this and the glowing reviews and knowing the good reputation of fuller brush figured I'd try it. Well it is amazing and the kind of thing you didn't know you needed until you tried it. It gets to my scalp without getting tangled in my long hair and works great not only as a shampoo brush but also as a massage brush on dry hair. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: bbg

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan!
customer_reviews.text: I think you can find something a lot cheaper than this to massage your scalp and distribute your shampoo through your hair. I have fine hair and when I use this, I can feel my hair breaking even though I am very careful when using this. I find that the shower comb that I use to run through my hair for conditioner works better than this and I paid around $3 or less for it. Save your money. The Shower brush that is made by Fuller is great for your back, etc, and is a lot cheaper than this.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly B. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the one I had, which began losing teeth. I suppose that is to be expected since it was purchased over 60 years ago in the 1950s by my mother. It had washed the hair for 3 generations. Not too shabby. No change at all in the design. The bristles are a little softer in this one. I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: BFDow

customer_reviews.title: The first one lasted years.  It feels good for scalp massage.  The cat like it too.
customer_reviews.text: This simple little brush is great for people and pets. If the first one hadn't lasted so long I couldn't have justified the cost of this replacement. In addition to working well for people's heads and pets, it makes a good back scratcher. After many years, the leading plastic bristles began to break off.
customer_reviews.author: Masnor

customer_reviews.title: Not for people with long, thick hair.
customer_reviews.text: I have long, thick hair and bought this because another reviewer said that this brush was good for long, thick hair. It is not. This is a brush for someone with short, straight hair. It is useless for me. (If anyone knows of a good scalp brush for me, please leave the info in the comments.) P.S. This brush should have a hole in the handle or rope by which to hang it. I had nowhere to place it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have thick hair and have used a scrubby to get my scalp clean for 40 years. My mom always had a fuller brush one like this and I have tried others but still go back to using this one. Hope they keep making them for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy V.

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: I have A LOT of thick hair. It is hard to shampoo and feel like my scalp is clean, too. With this product, I am able to reach my scalp. It would work even better if the teeth were a bit longer. But, overall I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Summer3

customer_reviews.title: Glad to finally find a scalp massager that met all ...
customer_reviews.text: Glad to finally find a scalp massager that met all my needs. The handle makes it easier to reach and the bristles are just the right softness. I use every time I shower to get a good tingly feeling on my scalp as I shampoo. Feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Richards

customer_reviews.title: Not so good with minimum hair
customer_reviews.text: This product probably works better with people that have more hair than I. I'm mostly bald and the prongs do not feel good when pressed against my scalp, bristles feel much better.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald J. Estvander

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shampoo brush for my husband who had rheumatoid arthritis and is unable to reach the top and back of his head. He loves it! For the first time in years, he is able to give himself a proper shampoo and scalp massage. The reason for the 4-star rating: it could be a bit longer, and a slight curve in the handle would make it perfect. As is, it works well enough.
customer_reviews.author: VFS

customer_reviews.title: This brush is essential for long hair
customer_reviews.text: My three daughters and I all have long hair and we all use this brush to detangle our hair. I comb my hair before I rinse out the conditioner which saves my hair from breakage. Without this brush, it takes about half an hour to comb out the snarls. This brush is a must have for long hair.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie J. Ruemenapp

customer_reviews.title: Great for limited reach. Gets rid of flakes. Cleans scalp well.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve issues with my elbows and only one hand reaches my hair/head. This is a perfect tool to walk my hair well. I have flakes occasionally and using this has reduced it dramatically. I’ve no flakes and to test it, I stopped using it a few times flakes returned. Used it again and no flakes. Really cleans scalp well. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Joan Labayen

customer_reviews.title: Great for dandruff
customer_reviews.text: Great for this with thick hair and dandruf. It gets in deep and penetrates in a way fingers cant and leaves the head clean. Couldnt be happier wish I found this sooner. Would've saved me from some embarrassing times in highschool.
customer_reviews.author: BBJ

customer_reviews.title: An old favorite !
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these for years, makes my scalp feel really clean. Don’t know why no other company has a brush like this, only one I’ve ever found.
customer_reviews.author: Dennie

customer_reviews.title: Fuller Designers-Wake Up!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It gives my head and scalp a real clean feeling after shampooing. I would have given a 5 star rating except that it lacks a hole in the handle to put in a loop for easy hanging.I suppose that I could do it myself but why ruin an otherwise good thing. Come on Fuller...you can do a bit better!
customer_reviews.author: LBC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Brush
customer_reviews.text: I have hair down to my waist and I have been using this massage brush for years , was very disappointed that the company discontinued the facial brush though ,I still have one but needed another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This is shorter than I was expecting and it’s kind of hard to hold when it’s wet. It is easy to clean because of the wide spaces.
customer_reviews.author: MMcg

customer_reviews.title: A must have for men.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using these for years and loves them. He is almost 78 years old with a full head of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Howe

customer_reviews.title: No more flakey scalp
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son. He has a flakey scalp and we felt it was because he didn't scrub well enough when he washed his hair. The brush has helped him. Now his scalp/hair is improving almost no more flaking. Very happy. Flakey scalp is not always dandruff.
customer_reviews.author: Sueb

customer_reviews.title: I've used this product in its earlier manifestations for years ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product in its earlier manifestations for years. I have a short crew cut, so it works perfectly for shampooing.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Seits

customer_reviews.title: Love this well made shampoo brush
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo brush. I had one that fit over your fingers but they aren't as rigid as this. It also seems to cause less fatigue because of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: yet awesome brush. I like the fact that it is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple, yet awesome brush. I like the fact that it is one solid piece with no attachments that could possibly fall off. (My hair is pretty curly!!)
customer_reviews.author: PJK

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These work great when shampooing your hair. I try to keep a few extra on hand all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. It does not irritated your scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Longterm satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: I have used this same brush for the past 30 years. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: too rough
customer_reviews.text: the knobs are too rough, too hard and not bendable to scrub or wash the hair, the handle is short. given the price and review , i expected it better than this. totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: dee dee

customer_reviews.title: Just a hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but I don't think this is any different than a regular hair brush.
customer_reviews.author: RYWTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job but I thought it was too sharp and pointy. You couldn't massage deep into your scalp without pain.
customer_reviews.author: S Bullington

customer_reviews.title: Great Scalp Brush
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for many years and I continue to replace them and always hope Fuller is still in business and they are still making this excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: JHW

customer_reviews.title: it was exactely as stated in there description of the product.
customer_reviews.text: It was a newer version of a great product. i really enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Louis C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this scalp/shampoo brush. I used this brush many years ago and was happy to find that Amazon carried it. It feels really good on my scalp, I am very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: c young

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice product that massages the scalp. Great for dry scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Helen S.

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Product ok. Bristles are not very firm. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Love

customer_reviews.title: It's nice when you can find exactly what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a replacement scalp and shampoo brush for quite a while. I was really glad when I found this one. Exactly the same style and size as the one I have been using for years and years.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush for the shower
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush for the shower. Use it anytime I need to do a deep conditioner or treatment to get throughout my hair. Bristle feel nice on scalp and give you a nice massage at the same time
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: You won't want to shampoo with out it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy on scalp,also use it on my beard. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Brush is too hard it scratches my scalp! Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: Soothing massage and  easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to find this brush as it's very soothing. Keeps my scalp clean and free of flaking/dandruff. Dimensions: 7" x 3" x 1" inches approx, hard plastic. Sturdy and very easy to clean. I used to buy Swissco scalp brushes which have a nubby soft texture. But every single one would get moldy (the Swissco had a water drainage hole but it kept the water in and caused mold) You won't have the issue with this brush as it is solid and has no holes. I would not recommend this for a sensitive scalp. If you have long, thick hair use only on scalp and gently.
customer_reviews.author: R.Demain

customer_reviews.title: Love This Scalp Brush!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Fuller scalp brush to increase blood blow for my scalp in an effort to combat hair loss. It feels so good to use while shampooing! This brush is made entirely out of a hard rubber(?) material and is very strongly made. Don't have to worry about breaking the handle or applying too much pressure. Have used Fuller Brush products for many many years and knew without hesitation that this would be a good product I could trust and depend on. Highly recommend this product! As a side comment: tried to purchase this same item from my Fuller Brush rep but was told it is unavailable. Thank goodness for Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: MysficFire

customer_reviews.title: Have psoriasis on my scalp them and arthritis in my hands... This is definitely A tool I am glad to have at my disposal!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would've thought of this sooner! I have psoriasis on my scalp and long, thick, coarse, curly hair. I also have arthritis in my hands which makes it very difficult to be able to get my scalp clean. This made it so much easier! Not to mention how great it felt massaging my head with this tool! I could not believe how much better my scalp felt after I got done using this as an aid. My scalp has not felt this good in years. Definitely recommend to anybody who has a difficult time with the shampoo process or just wants feel good scalp massage!
customer_reviews.author: Mother Hen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for dry scalp or Dry Itchy Scalp
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought the Fuller Brush Scalp Massager, it is a brush with short white bristles that are hard but giving on your scalp. If you have a dry scalp, or an itchy dry scalp, then this scalp massager brush is for you. I use the brush when I wash my hair with Tresseme Dry Scalp Shampoo, all you have to do is brush your scalp in circular patterns over the itchy or dry area's and the pores in your scalp open up. It feels wonderful, and I have found it to work wonderfully. Will Purchase Again if Needed, but the brush is very sturdy and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: DAWNNY

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: I really like this scalp massager. It’s easy to use and doesn’t tangle my hair and the prongs aren’t too soft or hard. I can feel the blood circulation increase to my scalp when I use this. It’s very simple, lightweight and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom

customer_reviews.title: Not soft !
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps i just have a sensitive scalp. Even with very light pressure,i feel as though i am actually scratching my scalp. If you have a sensitive scalp,you may want to steer clear of this item. It is in no way to be considered "soft". I am still keeping it and using it. Just not as frequently as i had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ray

customer_reviews.title: For dogs and husbands
customer_reviews.text: Great super-sturdy design, way nicer than the flimsy round plastic ones. Pretty sure it's originally for dogs, but works great for shampooing husbands as well. Bonus, it's helped with his itchy scalp, and works a lot better than those round scalp brushes with the tiny finger holes.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Great for beards!
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic scrubber for bearded folks. Helps shampoo or co-wash lift dirt and oil off the skin and wash dead skin cells away. A great way to exfoliate your skin that's buried under face fur. A real treat in the morning shower! The handle is much more ergonomic than the traditional round shampoo scrubbers. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Navarro Parker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find scalp/shampoo massagers like I used to buy at local drug stores. So ordered another product on-line that looked like the old ones but the bristles were very soft and did not work well to help detangle long, thick hair. Ordered this one because Fuller Brush has been known to have good products. It has stiff bristles and works great getting through the hair. I was skeptical about the style with a handle like this but found this works great as well. I will be ordering another one or two for my other showers.
customer_reviews.author: L M.

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: For three months now, this brush is apart of my morning shower routine. I put the shampoo in the brush and start massaging my scalp. I also use it one a week for my conditioner. This brush truly does the job and it feels sooooo good!
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Jed

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't shampoo without it. I've had this iteration of the brush for a few years, and had earlier ones for as long as I can remember. Its the best scalp massage ever!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bobster

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush Ever
customer_reviews.text: Excellent brush. Not hard on the scalp and light and easy to hold. I highly recommend this as an everyday brush, and have even been buying it for my friends to try.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Loader McGee

customer_reviews.title: Still the very best
customer_reviews.text: Fuller still makes the best brushes, hands down. I've used their shampoo brushes all my life; they make the scalp feel wonderful and really prevent dandruff.
customer_reviews.author: bauerr

customer_reviews.title: Not for a sensative scalp
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are not flexible at all, I was hoping that they would have. I do use it every other day, but I don't apply pressure at all.
customer_reviews.author: cross stitch/cross eyed

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this shampoo brush from fuller since the 70's! I love it & it lasts a very long time! I am in my 60"s now & I feel that I still have a full head of hair due the the use of this massage action!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I need a scalp massager brush WITH A HANDLE
customer_reviews.text: I need a scalp massager brush WITH A HANDLE because I one of my arms is disabled. This works great as a substitute for fingers while shampooing my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Beesusie

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Scalp Brush
customer_reviews.text: I like the Fuller Brush Scalp Massage Brush but I wouldn't call it a Shampoo Brush. I wouldn't know how to shampoo my hair with it. It gives a great scalp massage and is not too hard or too soft for me. I think it's excellent for men or shorter hair and it's good for longer hair but not great. It tends to tangle if you're not too careful.
customer_reviews.author: Aalea1

customer_reviews.title: Still A Great Brush
customer_reviews.text: Been purchasing this brush for many years. Quality continues to be top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Smiley

customer_reviews.title: I am 65 and was so happy I found it on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: My Mom had one she used on us 6 kids .I am 65 and was so happy I found it on Amazon. Feels so good when I use it on my head like a massage !
customer_reviews.author: judy keck

customer_reviews.title: Buy more than one!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these brushes for probably 40 years. They don't last forever, that is why I bought 4, but it massages your head and also helps to get all the shampoo out of your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine L. Stalter

customer_reviews.title: Would like it to be a little larger
customer_reviews.text: I had one years ago, don't remember the bristles as being so stiff. But then I used to have hair too. It also seems smaller than I remember. Would like it to be a little larger, and have softer bristles and a lanyard to hang it with.
customer_reviews.author: Mr D.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I love washing my hair with this brush. It makes my hair feel cleaner and my scalp doesn't feel as itchy as it used to.
customer_reviews.author: CTree

customer_reviews.title: There is no better scalp/shampoo brush than the one made by Fuller Brush
customer_reviews.text: There is no better scalp/shampoo brush than the one made by Fuller Brush! I am so happy to have found it on Amazon!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite E. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Scrub Brush
customer_reviews.text: For thick and coarse hair, it work beautifully. I am ordering another one for the men in my life they love it. Cleans up nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Greshake

customer_reviews.title: Nice hair product
customer_reviews.text: Have used these for many years after getting out of the shower - still a good product
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for this for awhile, my husband wore one out he uses it when he shampoos
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great aid for  home shampoos
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these brushes for years, and was happy to find current replacements on Amazon's site.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: RA: this helps shampoo your hair. It makes your scalp feel better
customer_reviews.text: This makes it easier to shampoo my hair. I can reach things easier.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Heads up!
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and is very effective in relief for my Mother-in-laws scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine S. Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Good and inexpensive purchase
customer_reviews.text: Want a good shampoo using the brush on the scalp? This does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Duerr

customer_reviews.title: A.MUST.HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: Had one before when my hair was waist length. Times change. Now with short hair & one good hand, a really must have! Comfortable on the scalp. Does a super job of cleaning the scalp when shampooing & conditioning! Did not have to wash my hair as often when I had long hair cause it cleans & distributes 'poos & 'ditioner so well!
customer_reviews.author: S. Whipp

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of skeptical spending so much money on a plastic scalp brush, but I am very happy with this product. It is very sturdy and the bristles are spaced just right and are the perfect thickness. I would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.D

customer_reviews.title: Great company with excellent products.
customer_reviews.text: Fuller Brush has been around for over 100 years. Their products are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pierce

customer_reviews.title: great feeling brush
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is nice and stiff but you just need mild pressure if at all and for a short time. I think it's great for the scalp in general.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Weis

customer_reviews.title: Scalp brush
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as I remembered. My aunt used one of these all the time. Actually this is for my dog. It is so much softer than some of the torturous ones found in pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: Dillie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like I remember
customer_reviews.text: Had an original that was over 50 years old (true). The brush had lost almost all its teeth but I still kept it. Thought this company was no longer around so when I came across it I ordered. This is a great product and exactly the same as the original. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Yes, I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is something I've had in the past and was looking to replace my old one. It is great in the shower for long hair. My grandchildren use it too whenever they visit. Their hair is long and thick and needs to be straigthened out just after they wash their hair. Something I use almost every day!
customer_reviews.author: Marta Bethune

customer_reviews.title: Iit makes washing my hair easier
customer_reviews.text: I am from KSA,I will order more of this tool for my friends,it is really works for inchy scalp.It sshorten the time you are talking to wash your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Mona

customer_reviews.title: Same product I have been using since I was a ...
customer_reviews.text: Same product I have been using since I was a kid. The Fuller Brush man would come to the house.
customer_reviews.author: Harris B

product_meta.title: Fuller Brush Scalp Massage & Shampoo Brush - Manual Shower Head Massager & Shampooer w/ Soft Claw For Rejuvenating Scalps - Gentle Hair Cleansing For Men & Women
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteGive your scalp an invigorating massage with the gentle touch of our unique scalp massage & shampoo brush. Soft fingers stimulate the scalp and leave the hair tangle-free. 7 inch overall length.
feature_bullets: SCALP MASSAGE: Use the Fuller Brush Scalp Massage & Shampoo Brush to give your scalp a refreshing massage. Soft “fingers” gently massage the scalp while distributing shampoo and detangling hair, leaving your scalp feeling clean and invigorated.

HEALTHY HAIR: Get the extra cleaning power you need to make your scalp and hair look and feel their very best. The elastic bristles will remove unwanted dandruff and skin, distributing natural oils for healthier, shiny hair.

ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Featuring a 7-inch overall length, the Scalp Massage & Shampoo Brush is equipped with an ergonomically designed, wide handle to provide an easy grip and handling when massaging your scalp.

BUILT TO LAST: The white plastic block is resistant to cracking, warping and bacteria growth to provide long-term strength and hygienic use. After use, simply rinse the brush and allow to air dry for future use.

TRUSTED BRAND: Since 1906, Fuller Brush has provided high-quality products that are designed to work and built to last. Whether you're looking for cleaning supplies and tools, or personal care brushes and skin care products, Fuller Brush has you covered!
